channel.title: Lizbeth's Journal on Ritual dust
channel.description: Recent content in Lizbeth's Journal on Ritual dust

item.title: day 3
item.description: Me and Hex finished the upcoming music video for their VOIDXWITCH project last night and then I spent some good time printing a new small linocut print in the scorching heat of the last heatwave to hit Montreal. Today we’re braving the heat to go practice for our upcoming live show.

item.title: day 2
item.description: I woke up to new submissions for the second issue of my zine Fant√¥mes which started my day really well and I received my bodhran kit from Ireland, which I’ll be slowly putting together. Plenty of exciting things coming up in my future!

item.title: Test
item.description: Recently found out about the html journal format and decided to give it a try to replace my (mostly stagnant) now page. I though it could be interesting to bring the latest one on the home page too, making it some kind of latest news section.
